short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WorldTimes Chrome extension: stay connected to global time zones with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the "WorldTimes Extension" â€“ your one-stop solution for effortlessly managing time zones from around the globe. This exceptional extension is designed to keep you seamlessly connected to every corner of the world. It's the ideal companion for individuals with loved ones residing overseas or professionals engaged in international business endeavors.

By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing Worldwide Clock Extension and setting Chrome New Tab search results by Microsoft Bing as described by the services in terms of use 
https://dabcommunications.com/privacy-policy.php
https://dabcommunications.com/terms-of-service.php

Here's how the "WorldTimes Extension" operates:

1. Customizable Clocks: When users open a new window or tab, they can effortlessly tailor their clock display. Simply click the drop-down menu and select the preferred time zones.
2. Adding Clocks: After choosing a time zone, click the "+" symbol on the right side of the menu to include the desired clock.
3. Removing Clocks: Users have full control. To remove a clock, just click the "X" button located in the top right corner of each clock.
4. Persistent Settings: The selected clocks will persist across new tabs or windows. No need to reconfigure them each time.
5. Local Time and Date: In addition to the global clocks, users will find a digital clock on the top left corner of the screen. This displays the current time in their local area, along with the date.

Experience time zone management like never before with the "WorldTimes Extension."
